ch.iserver.ace.collaboration.jupiter
Interface AlgorithmWrapper

All Superinterfaces:
Algorithm
All Known Implementing Classes:
AlgorithmWrapperImpl
public interface AlgorithmWrapper
extends Algorithm

Wrapper interface for algorithm instances. Adds methods for receiving and generating CaretUpdate and the corresponding CaretUpdateMessage.

Method Summary
 CaretUpdateMessage generateCaretUpdateMessage(CaretUpdate update)
          Generates a CaretUpdateMessage for a locally generated CaretUpdate.
 CaretUpdate receiveCaretUpdateMessage(CaretUpdateMessage message)
          Receives a CaretUpdateMessage and returns the transformed CaretUpdate.

acknowledge, canRedo, canUndo, generateRequest, getSiteId, getTimestamp, receiveRequest, redo, transformIndices, undo
